pullRequest.title: Update server span
pullRequest.bodyText:
Closes #575
I have updated all places I have found where supposedly server span name was changed. Except for Spark
Corresponding Decorators were rewritten to be Tracers.

nodes.bodyText: since we only get the server span to update its name, does it make sense to scope this down to only support that use case? e.g. updateCurrentServerSpanName(String), or do you prefer this in case other use cases emerge, e.g. updating attributes(?)
would be better to set the span name directly in the Span.Builder in this case, i'd be happy with just a TODO marker here
